titles.title: To prohibit the admission of aliens to the United States for 10 years, and for other purposes.
To prohibit the admission of aliens to the United States for 10 years, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the admission of any alien into the United States for 10 years starting from this bill's enactment.
